name: Obliterate-Demo
description:
Obliterate Demo

                                                                             !WARNING!                                                                                                                         INTENSE SCREEN SHAKE AND FLASHING LIGHTS

Bad Guys Kidnaped The Girl you were meant to protect. She holds the key to immortality. Save her before they kill her.

The Game May Be Jarring at times, And Also Flashy,
yeah there's no sound or really much. the games STUPID hard and well at the moment its really janky. I hope to make things a bit smoother and add more latter on.
I just really wanted to make a Vertical shooter with rogue like elements 

there are bugs and unfair areas. 1 Boss and a few weapons and items

Controls:
WASD   move 
J             Shoot
K            Item
The little Circle At the bottom of the Screen Tells You If Your Gun Needs To Be Reloaded. The I or line is that Press again and you will reload after 2 seconds


To Do:
More
Stages, Bosses, Music, Sounds, Unlocks, Enemies, Endings, Items, Secretes,  Logs, Ships , Visuals, and General Fixings

Bugs: Some times things player or enemies don't take damage.
Some Scenes Tiles Break.
